response.original_title: Bob the Builder: Getting the Job Done!
response.overview: "Travis gets lucky": When Travis thinks that a lucky charm has given him the right tools to work on his own, what happens when he loses it? "Wendy's big night out": Wendy is nervous about delivering an important speech - can she dig up the confidence to get the job done? "Molly's fashion show": After paint goes flying, Molly finds inspiration and positive attitude for her fashion show. "Pilchard and the field mice": Bob must dig up the answer to a mystery when he discovers that some cookies are missing. "Trix's pumpkin pie": Trix tries to help out by hauling almost everything herself.
response.title: Bob the Builder: Getting the Job Done!
